https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5eF8oy8LPcqIHSbpuf8UARtSc7O.jpg A romantic drama set in 1961 that follows a young studio extra's ambitious efforts to reunite with the French girl he loves after being separated by the construction of the Berlin Wall. Dream Factory
